column4: Oct. 5 – Cambodian gold medalist of Asian Games 2018 Saly Ou Moeut has won another silver medal at the 2018 World Cup Ski Modified in the United States on 4 October 2018.------Saly said on Friday that he won a silver medal in Ski Modified game by competing with other 63 players from all over the world.------

column2: he expressed regret for not being able to achieve gold medal for the Cambodia.------Saly had participated three times representing Thailand and won three consecutive gold medals from Ski Modified games.------
